about_the_game:
This game was made by AI is a game made by AI. The code and instructions were provided by AI. We just put the code and the assets together.

The goal this game is to survive the dungeon, defeat enemies, and uncover hidden treasures, all while trying to make it out alive. Watch your health, manage resources, and be strategic as you traverse this infinite dungeon that only the bravest can conquer!
Explore room after room, battling relentless enemies, collecting health-restoring potions, and searching for the elusive exit. Victory awaits for those who can master the sword and survive long enough to find the way out. Every room offers a new test of skill, with enemies that need to be defeated using your sword’s precise attacks, each room adding a fresh layer of unpredictability. The game challenges players to balance combat, survival, and exploration in an endless adventure through dark, dangerous dungeons.

Explore, fight, survive, and escape—how long can you last in This game was made by AI?

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 64bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: This game was made by AI is a roguelike action game where players navigate procedurally generated rooms, battle enemies with sword attacks, and search for potions and exits. Each run presents new challenges, requiring strategy and skill to survive and escape the endless dungeon.
